name: IN THE DARK (itch) (MelkerB)
description:
This game was made for the "Kenney Jam 2021".

The theme for the jam was "rotating". 

You play as an astronaut whom has crashlanded on an unknown planet. The planet however is rotating extremely fast which means that one day on this planet is around 10 seconds on earth, and the same goes for the night. To fix your ship you will need to gather resources, some of them you'll only be able to find during the night and vice versa.

Oh and don't die!

Art - https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack and https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-shmup

Sounds/Music - https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/arcade/ and https://opengameart.org/content/spy-16bit-8bit-chiptune-retro-style-song-for-you...

Later made by Nicole Marie T
